field.name: latitude
field.label: Initial Latitude
field.description: Set the initial google map latitude (default: 40.54629751976399)

field.name: longitude
field.label: Initial Longitude
field.description: Set the initial google map longitude (default: 23.01861169311519)

field.name: zoom
field.label: Initial Map Zoom
field.description: Set the initial google map zoom on new issue(default: 17)

field.name: maplanguage
field.label: Map Language
field.description: Setting the google map language so as to display addresses correctly (default: en)

field.name: mapregion
field.label: Map Region
field.description: Setting the google map language so as to display addresses correctly (default: GB)

field.name: searchterm
field.label: Hidden search term
field.description: Define a hidden term for reverse geocoding like the name of a Municipality or PO

field.name: allowcommentingonclose
field.label: Comment on closed issues
field.description: If yes, comments are allowed on closed issues

field.name: allowvotingonclose
field.label: Vote on closed issues
field.description: If yes, voting is allowed on closed issues

fieldset.name: mailnotifications
fieldset.label: Mail Notifications
fieldset.description: Settings about mail notifications on users and administrators on new issues and new comments

field.name: mailnewissueuser
field.label: On new issue to user
field.description: If yes, an email will be send to user who submitted the issue

field.name: mailnewissueadmins
field.label: On new issue to admins
field.description: If yes, the admins (as set on notes field on each specific category where the new issue belongs) will receive an informative email

field.name: mailnewcommentuser
field.label: On new comment to user
field.description: If yes, an email will be send to user who initially submitted the issue

field.name: mailnewcommentadmins
field.label: On new comment to admins
field.description: If yes, the admins (as set on notes field on each specific category where the comment belongs) will receive an informative email

field.name: mailcategorychangeadmins
field.label: On change category
field.description: ADMIN 2 ADMIN: If yes, the admins of the new category (as set on notes field) will receive an informative email

field.name: mailstatuschangeuser
field.label: On change status
field.description: ADMIN 2 USER: If yes, the user who submitted the issue will receive an informative email

field.name: loadjquery
field.label: Load jQuery js
field.description: If your template or other component loads jQuery you can select not to load jQuery again

field.name: loadbootstrap
field.label: Load Bootstrap js
field.description: If your template or other component loads Bootstrap you can select not to load Bootstrap js again

field.name: loadbootstrapcss
field.label: Load Bootstrap css
field.description: If your template or other component loads Bootstrap CSS you can select not to load Bootstrap js again

field.name: popupmodal
field.label: Ajax modal class
field.description: If your template overrides the com_user and set behavior modal with ajax handler select Yes

field.name: credits
field.label: Show credits
field.description: If yes, an information alert is displayed under the map
